basics.name: Stephen Puthenpurackal
basics.label: Front End Developer, Back-End Developer, Full-Stack Developer Certified, Computer Science

summary.description: An Inquisitive Computer Science student, skilled with strong foundations in Mathamathics, Technological Acuity, Creativity, and inferential logic. Committed and Challenge driven, my ambition in life is to apply my skillsets to benet others, whether it be people around me or the corportation that I work for. My Prior occupations do not have any relation to who I am currently due to the change of study and interests during the course of my college career, but shows excellence in the ability to collaborate, communicate, and work with others effiently.

work.name: Data Entry Technician

work.description: Worked with reading and writing patient documents and transcribing them onto a digital format, in regards to the doctor who needed these files to clinically diagnose and give active care to her patients.

highlights: Scanned documents and saved in database to keep records of essential organizational information.
Reviewed and updated client correspondence files and database information to maintain accurate records.
Evaluated source documents to locate information needed for each data entry field.
